attributes.action: Fund increased research into MCAS, PoTS and EDS and improved patient care
attributes.additional_details:
There is too little awareness of these conditions, meaning they can go undiagnosed, and patients not receive the care they need. However they are very real and a lot of people are very sick!
 
Please try to make the lives of people with these conditions easier by providing additional funding for research into these conditions, and to improve patient care.
attributes.background: Mast cell activation syndrome (MCAS), Postural tachycardia syndrome (PoTS), Ehlers-Danlos syndromes (EDS) are chronic conditions that can be debilitating. However, too many people with these conditions don't receive the support they need. We want increased funding for research and patient care.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
